Home » 3V Mahāvaggapāḷi » 9 Campeyyakkhandhaka
9.11 Pabbājanīyakammakathā
Campeyyakkhandhaka
Pabbājanīyakammakathā
413.
1848Idha pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kuladūsako hoti pāpasamācāro. Tatra ce bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti—  ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu kuladūsako pāpasamācāro. Handassa mayaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ karomā’ti. Te tassa pabbājanīyakammaṃ karonti—  adhammena vaggā. So tamhā āvāsā aññaṃ āvāsaṃ gacchati. Tatthapi bhikkhūnaṃ evaṃ hoti—  ‘ayaṃ kho, āvuso, bhikkhu saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakato adhammena vaggehi. Handassa mayaṃ pabbājanīyakammaṃ karomā’ti. Te tassa pabbājanīyakammaṃ karonti—  adhammena samaggā…pe…  dhammena vaggā…  dhammapatirūpakena vaggā…  dhammapatirūpakena samaggā…pe… .
1849Cakkaṃ kātabbaṃ.
<< 9.10 Niyassakammakathāup9.12 Paṭisāraṇīyakammakathā >>
